name: IKSaveOptions
desc: The IKSaveOptions class initializes, adds, and manages user interface options for saving image data.

items.name: init!(imageProperties: [AnyHashable : Any]!, imageUTType: String!)
items.desc: Initializes a save options accessory pane for the provided image properties and uniform type identifier.

items.name: func addAccessoryView(to: NSSavePanel!)
items.desc: Adds IKSaveOptions accessory view to a NSSavePanel.

items.name: var imageProperties: [AnyHashable : Any]!
items.desc: Returns a dictionary of updated image properties that reflects the user’s selection.

items.name: var imageUTType: String!
items.desc: Returns the uniform type identifier that reflects the user’s selection.

items.name: var userSelection: [AnyHashable : Any]!
items.desc: Returns a dictionary that contains the save options selected by the user.

items.name: func saveOptions(IKSaveOptions!, shouldShowUTType: String!) -> Bool
items.desc: Called to determine if the specified uniform type identifier should be shown in the save panel.
